title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-1.5 - Safety appliances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-1.5 - Safety appliances

State Regulations
(a) No
person shall remove or tamper with any safety appliance prescribed by this Part
except for the purpose of making repairs. (b) No person shall in any manner load the
safety valve to a greater pressure than allowed by the certificate of
inspection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-1.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
